about_the_game:
Puzzle game with numbers.
Observe, find and combine clues to open doors.
No horror. No storyline. Just Logic!
This is my first personal game on Steam. I hope you enjoy it.



You need to know some basic English words, search google, use calculator.
- Zero, one, two, three... ten. Cat, dog, chicken...
- 1+1=2, 550/2= ̶2̶̶2̶̶5̶ 275, 7568/86=88...

Warning! The game is not for relaxation.
Dev: "After I finish developing the game.
I sent a copy to the past 2 years ago to myself.
He can't finish the game, gets angry and gives up,
nor can he give a negative rating because the game doesn't exist yet."

If you don't see the password in the picture?


System Requirements: year 2020
Graphics: year 2000
Gameplay: year 1990

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 | 11
  • Processor: i5 4460 | Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti | RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low / Medium setting | 60fps | 1080p Full HD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 | 11
  • Processor: i3 9100 | Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 | RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High / Ultra setting | 60fps | 1080p Full HD
